org.apache.ctakes.ytex.uima.mapper

Class MapperConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.ytex.uima.mapper.MapperConfig

  • public class MapperConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    semi-ugly hack to communicate options from the MapperService to the individual Mappers. The individual mappers are non-spring beans and should stay that way.
